divs: Sighting DetailsI HAD JUST DRIVED IN MY STREET WHEN I NOTICED TOWARD THE WEST A FEW BALLS OF RED LIGHT THEN I NOTICED MORE THE TREES WERE IN THE WAY SO I COULD ONLY SEE THEM AS THEY PASSED IN TOTAL ABOUT 20 THEY WERE LIKE FLOATING ALONG AT THE SPEED OF ABOUT A PLANE AS THEY HEADED WEST THEY SEEMED TO DISPEAR GOT SMALLER AND JUST DISAPEARED THEY SEEMED much FURTHER AWAY WHEN THEY DISapeared i thought these are not flares because i have seen flares i thought maybe they were those Chinese ballons that go up with a flame on the bootom but they were big about basket ball size at a distance i live about 15 miles from Miami international airport where planes come in from the west i noticed alot of passenger jets i imagine comming in after the lights disapeared like if the jets had not been allowed to pass untill after the lights had disapeared because alot starting comming in after the lights had disapeared a few of them did not make any sound going towards the airport it all seemed strange the sky was compleatly clear and a large moon shinning i guess it was a full moon.
